Name: Sayonara Golden Days
About the game: You will play a downcast game developer, opening your only and failed project for the last time. The teammates who worked on the game are no longer with you, but as your memories of them merge with reality, you will once again step into the world of fantasy. Main gameplay: Investigate the room you are in to remember the past Play an unfinished puzzle game and find the truth through its commentary track The game includes: An unfinished puzzle game An in-game VR headset More than 30 levels A few butterflies 4,352 images (maybe, I didn't count) 357 audios (who cares) As many pixels as the size of your monitor Imagination
